title: Why Harry and Meghan's battle against the press is the last thing the Royal Family needs right now
text:
Having been dragged into an unprecedented constitutional crisis over Brexit, and with Prince Andrew’s friendship with convicted paedophile Jeffrey Epstein still under heavy media scrutiny, it is probably safe to say the Duke of Sussex’s extraordinary statement was the last thing the Queen needed after a torrid summer.

Although not quite a 21st century ‘annus horribilis’, 2019 is another year the monarch is unlikely to look back upon with “undiluted pleasure”.

With the Duke of Edinburgh now retired from public life, in recent years the 93-year-old sovereign has sought a quieter life, having endured her fair share of family dramas throughout an historic 67-year reign.
